section.p: Monitor the differing in, involving, or affecting physiological factors.

ol.li:
Contains exactly one [1..1] timeInstalled with data type Point In Time
Contains the date\ time that the monitor was applied to the patient.

Contains exactly one [1..1] timeRemoved with data type Point In Time
Contains the date\ time that the monitor was removed from the patient.

Contains exactly one [1..1] monitoringDevice, where its type is Surgery Device
Monitoring device that denotes the differing in, involving, or affecting physiological factors.

Contains exactly one [1..1] timeInstalled with data type Point In Time
Contains the date\ time that the monitor was applied to the patient.

Contains exactly one [1..1] timeRemoved with data type Point In Time
Contains the date\ time that the monitor was removed from the patient.

Contains exactly one [1..1] monitoringDevice, where its type is Surgery Device
Monitoring device that denotes the differing in, involving, or affecting physiological factors.
